mapper.select: SELECT user_id, username, password, fullname, date_of_birth, gender, phone, email, bio, profie_picture, role_name FROM user, roles where user.username = #{username} AND roles.role_id = user.role_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (username, password, fullname, date_of_birth, gender, phone, email, role_id) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{fullname}, #{date_of_birth}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{role_id});
